sentences.sContent: She wants to cruise the canals of France in a barge.
sentences.sCn: 她想坐驳船游览法国的运河。

sentences.sContent: He and his wife were planning to go on a world cruise.
sentences.sCn: 他和妻子那时正计划进行一次环球海上航游。

phrases.pCn: 汤姆·克鲁斯（美国著名影星）

remMethod.val: 汤姆·克鲁斯(Tom Cruise)在巡游(cruise)

words.tran: 巡洋舰；巡航飞机，警察巡逻车

trans.tranCn: 航游， 巡航；缓慢巡行
trans.tranOther: If you cruise an ocean, river, or canal, you travel around it or along it on a cruise
A cruise is a holiday during which you travel on a ship or boat and visit a number of places
